questions.question: What impact did the siege and Battle of the Alamo have on the Texas Revolution?

choices.answer: Santa Anna's cruelty inspired others to join the Texian army
Davy Crockett's mysterious death made him a folk hero
The Texians' losses motivated their revenge
Sam Houston pushed for a Constitution to be developed
